name: Cave Potions
description:
A submission to the Godot Wild Jam 43, with the theme "Combine". We didn't quite finish it, but we got it to a playable state :)

Combine enemy drops to buff or heal your character!  

Move with WASD, attack with either J or left click. If you use a controller attack is Square/ Xbox X/ Nintendo Y

Shoutouts to  executive producer Blayne.
